website_summaries.verdict: Customers looking for reusable mop pads at an affordable price will appreciate this versatile cleaning product.
pros: Proven to remove up to 99.9% of bacteria without chemicals
Comes with 3 microfiber pads: one for dusting fur and hair, one for water retention, and one for corners
cons: A little troublesome to keep the wet pad in place
Some buyers had issues with durability

website_summaries.verdict: With a wide mop head and multiple types of cleaning pads, this dry mop packs plenty of punch.
pros: Has a wide base (18 inches) that covers more floor area with each pass
Comes with 3 microfiber pads, including an electrostatic dry pad
Sturdy handle easily adjusts to a comfortable length
cons: Hook-and-loop pad attachments can loosen and detach

customer_reviews.title: Experienced Mopper Gives 5 Stars For This Product
customer_reviews.text: So, I waited a while to write this review because I wasn't entirely sure I was going to like it. It's not your typical mop. As a 48 year old mom/grandma, I have used several different mops over the years. I like this one the best. Been using it now for about 4 months and it's golden! I have 3 dogs that shed and sometimes pee on the floor and grandkids that spill pretty much everything. This mop easily and nicely cleans the messes and I know it's more sanitary than ordinary mops because I can thoroughly clean the heads either by hand or in the washing machine. I'm sold! This mop is the best :)
customer_reviews.author: shirley sylvia jones

customer_reviews.title: Worse mop I ever owned. Do not buy I owned many this is the worst
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY WORST MOP I EVER OWNED. IM A CLEAN FREAK I TRIED THE BONA SPRAY WORKS AMAZING AFTER 2months sprayer broke! This thing I used once it flips back when u pull towards u it doesn’t stay flat absolutely the worst u can’t clean at all unless u put it long ways. It’s horrible the worst do not buy please. I ordered a plan one amazon choice $19.99 I think this one is gonna be great. But this mop is awful the worst broke and can’t use properly
customer_reviews.author: Renee Humphreys

customer_reviews.title: I haven't had the mop 30 days yet and according to Amazon, I can't return it. I'm out $35.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to clean my laminated wood floors. It's useless already. Velcro strips on the base of the mop, used for holding the mop pad in place, came off with the pad when I took it off to wash it.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Mills

customer_reviews.title: It’s junk - don’t buy it!
customer_reviews.text: I barely used the mop over the past 2 months and it’s not worth the money. A few weeks ago, I was extending the pole and twisting the pole to tighten in place. Now it doesn’t not fully extended and when I go to mop forward, the pole slips down and pinched my finger. I’m not happy that this mop doesn’t work after a short period of time. I can only fully extend the mid section and it too short, which hurts my back when mopping. Piece of junk!!! Don’t buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Alina Willett

customer_reviews.title: Clean floors in half the time
customer_reviews.text: Having longer mop pads (about twice as long as the mop I'd been using) cuts floor cleaning time dramatically. I can clean the laminate wood floors in my apartment faster and more efficiently than I could with another floor mop. I particularly like the way the pads tightly adhere to the mop when I just place the mop on the back of a pad The swivel action of this mop makes it much easier to use than the floor cleaning mop that I previously used. Because the mop pads are machine washable, I save money because I don't need to buy less efficient paper pads. the pads
customer_reviews.author: Helen C. Slemons

customer_reviews.title: Best mop ever used!
customer_reviews.text: This has so many things I love. I have slate tile floors, 3 cats..... Once over with dry and then wet and look great! Now the best part. It fits behind the toilet! Down the sides between wall and turns with ease, strait across back wall! No more bending over the stool and reaching around! Buy it. You won’t be sorry. Just slap on the cloths and go at your height! Easy telescopic handle. Pull off cloth when done and in washer.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Cocherell

customer_reviews.title: Mop flips over, pad holder not stable, perhaps too narrow.
customer_reviews.text: Love the pads and mop but can't figure out how to keep the maps from flipping over when trying to wet mop. Very frustrating as you have to be very gentle and go in the same direction in order to prevent the mop from flipping. I really need something that can keep up with me and this just doesn't do it.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Glad I Kept it!!
customer_reviews.text: I nearly returned this mop system. i wanted one with the squirter bottle attached to the handle and when this arrived I realized I misunderstood the description. Anyway, the customer service rep practically begged me to try this and send it back used if I still didn't like it. I tried it and wow! It was incredibly thorough in it's cleaning capacity. No streaking on my light colored wood laminate floors, which had always been a problem before. I use a mixture of Windex and water, squirt it on the floor and mop. It's easy, fast, and leaves no residue or streaks. I'm a fan!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Williams

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last but two uses. However, they stood by their product.
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked when it broke, but love this mop. When I contacted the company they were shocked as was I, but they sent me a new one and I have used it many more times and I still love it. Would highly recommend this mop.
customer_reviews.author: kasielee

customer_reviews.title: Unusable, constantly flips.
customer_reviews.text: This was one of the worst purchases I’ve ever made. Unless you mop in a figure 8 motion it is useless. I mop in a back and forth motion and it constantly flips. So annoying!!
customer_reviews.author: Gaby

customer_reviews.title: Mopping made easier!
customer_reviews.text: "LESS DRAG ON HARDWOOD FLOORS!!! I own my own cleaning business (into 4th year now) and the vacuuming and mopping is taking a toll on my body. Your wet mop pad glides much easier over any type of floor and my 51 year old back and elbows salute you!"
customer_reviews.author: William Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Difficult  to use
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely horrible to use. It flips up on you and you can’t keep the mop on the floor plus this is not eligible for return within 30 days. I didn’t know this or I would have sent it back weeks ago. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: vincent

customer_reviews.title: This thing makes cleaning reasonable!
customer_reviews.text: OH MY GOODNESS. You guys need this in your life. At first I was like $40 for a mop?! But it has saved my sanity. I was gonna go insane using my swiffer mop where the pad would fall off every two seconds. This cleans my floors super well and covers a lot of surface area so my floor is mopped within minutes! It’s also very easy to clean and I love that it’s reusable. Saves the earth, keeps your house spotless, and saves ya that coin in the long run! 10-10 recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Macie Eddy

customer_reviews.title: very hard to push on my tile
customer_reviews.text: for my tile floors was very hard push the mop. anyone with a bad back could not use this mop. so very disappointed as i really needed a mop, then to find out it can't be returned was a second disappointment
customer_reviews.author: carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Terrific cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: This mop is terrific! It's well-made and cleans both my slate and wood floors so well, with just water ( or, you can use a spritz of cleaner on the floors). You can also use it as a dust mop with one of the extra cloths that come with it. It preserves the finish on all types of floors and removes dirt very well! (It's advertised to remove most of the bacteria, too, so that's a big plus!) My floors have never looked better and I'm so glad I can safely damp mop them now!
customer_reviews.author: Chrisb

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect, but I still like the product
customer_reviews.text: It won't pick up every little speck of dust, but it works well enough to make my floors extremely clean. First I sweep the floors for dust and cat hair (I have two) Then I run the microfiber mop to pick up anything I missed. Then I attach the mop attachment and use Murphys oil and it works extremely well. The handle length is adjustable for sweeping and the head swivels well for hard to reach places. Don't expect a perfect sweeper that will pick up every little thing, but if you are looking for a good mop/okay sweeper, then buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Dovey

customer_reviews.title: Love it, works on laminate
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I use one similar to this at work, but I always thought it'd be good for around the house. And it is, I just used to sweep and it really works well. U have laminate floors, and saw some reviews that said it would not work, but trust me it does. I have not yet tried the microfiber wet mopping yet. Update: the wet mopping is quick, efficient and feels and looks very clean. This is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Light

customer_reviews.title: Simple and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item after looking at several different cleaning products. I was looking for a lightweight mop for my mom who has back problems. It was easy to set up and she was in love with the product right out of the box. I waited for her to use it and confirm that it worked as expected and it did not disappoint us. Not only it was easy to use but also easy to clean up after completing the chores. My next purchase will be one for me. Thanks for making her life a little easier.
customer_reviews.author: AV

customer_reviews.title: 10 out 10 would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Aside from being a great product, I was so happy with the customer service. My mop arrived missing one of its pads, I emailed and within hours received a response as well as solution. Not only did they send the pad I needed but all 3. Above and beyond! I use my mop almost daily, love how easy to use and efficient it is!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I loved this mop...until it broke
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. We just put hardwood floors throughout our home and use these mops every day. Update: 8 months after purchasing this mop kit, the plastic piece that holds the head onto the handle broke and so now the mop is pretty much useless. Actually kind of surprised that it made it this long, now that I see how small/thin this plastic piece is. Now have to buy a whole new mop set just because one cheap little part broke. Not a happy camper. I'll be buying a different brand this time.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Guillory

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for hardwood laminate
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for hardwood laminate! packs up nice and small for easy storage and I love the telescoping handle. We have a dog that splits her time between indoor and backyard, and the fine head does a great job of picking up her hair off the floor. The fringe head top is my go to for sweeping, and the medium head is the one I use for actual mopping. I recommend rinsing the heads after 2-3 uses, because they really do pick up a ton of dirt. Read the care instructions and this bad boy will be your favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Mmgonzo

customer_reviews.title: This mop was well worth waiting for... ...
customer_reviews.text: This mop was well worth waiting for...I use it almost daily in my kitchen to clean up drips. I am a very drippy person...80 years old with advanced essential tremor. I also use another hear to dust the floor. The washing directions that came before the mop were also complete, very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: granny shrink

customer_reviews.title: Decent mop... Could be more durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought in November 2017. Worked great but eventually the handle stripped and would not hold when you wanted to change length of handle. I put a screw in it at a length we liked and it lasted until today April 18,2020. The swivel where the handle attaches to the mop head broke. We used it rly to clean floors every week since we bought it. With it was a bit more heavy duty but will like buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: TBiggs

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I like all the attachment heads it come with. I have washed and hung to dry all the attachments and they are still in perfect shape after three weeks; I have used it at least 4 times. Super easy to assemble. Sturdy. The head can swivel or be locked. My favorite part is the versatility of this product. Great buy. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: BubbleGum

customer_reviews.title: Cheap cheap. Not dependable.
customer_reviews.text: Loved it at first only had it three weeks first time use the little silver thingy came off then today I pulled off the mat and the black thing came off. I’m going back to my turbo mop. I’ll never order again from here. Oh and there was no way for me to contact seller directly.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Don't lose money buying this product. I lose $40
customer_reviews.text: My mop broked in 2 days! It is very difficult to use.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel

customer_reviews.title: Defective handle - update
customer_reviews.text: I finally used the mop for the first time and discovered that the telescoping handle does not tighten and secure on at the lower spot. It does tighten in the higher spot, so I know that there is a problem with the bottom part of the handle. Can Temples Pride please help me get a replacement handle? Update: Temples Price sent me a replacement handle free of charge. Customer service was excellent. It's now working great!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas S

customer_reviews.title: Simply amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This duster/mop is amazing! I have multiple sclerosis with limited stamina. I also have a service dog, a boxer & 3 cats. Needless to say, I have little bit of hair in my house. The Dredge duster picked up so much hair it was incredible. I was almost embarrassed because I keep a very clean house (so I thought). It was extremely lightweight & easy to use. Same goes for the mop! The ONLY thing I wish was different was the washing instructions. I basicly have to wash the pads all by themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Due

customer_reviews.title: Great mop when you read the directions ....
customer_reviews.text: I read great reviews on this mop and wanted a great mop to use on my new wood floors. I had the hardest time using it. I wrote to Temples Pride and he was so nice and offered such great customer service. The mop comes with three pads. I didn't read the directions so I was using the dry mop with Bona and it kept flipping over. Now that I know which pad to use for what I am doing the mop is doing a great job. I would buy from this company as they are so in to customer service. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: cheri a friedman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use !
customer_reviews.text: I love this mop, it’s the best adjustable handle I’ve encountered and saves my back. I love all the different attachments because they are actually effective cleaning my hardwood floors. I have 2 young children and use this daily and it has held up so well these are great quality pads !
customer_reviews.author: Whiriker

customer_reviews.title: works exactly how I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Great product, works great pads aren't cheap. My only issue is thr bottom part is screwed in instead of a clip in or something, so it tends to get loose fairly often since the head swiveled both ways but a bit of thread glue fixed it.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge PG

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Worst mop sweeper I've ever had. It gets stuck on the ground and then flips around. It just sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis B.

customer_reviews.title: How sturdy this mop is!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I am writing a review of a mop! But this product so exceeded my expectations. It is very sturdy and the pads are nice and thick. The handle is super long so I can easily and comfortably maneuver mop around and under furniture. I love that it has hook and loop but also has little grip holes on the top so I can use other pads. Seriously, this mop is the best and they plant a tree with every purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Pike

customer_reviews.title: I love this mop
customer_reviews.text: So surprised, I love this mop, did not think it would work, but it truly does. The velcro bottom also allows one to attach anti bacterial towels and do a second mop sweep with them, great when you have dogs. Highly recommend this new mop design.
customer_reviews.author: HH

customer_reviews.title: Non standard pole connection on mop head
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for use in cleaning high ceilings and exterior walls. I was hoping the head connection would be a standard size and fit on a longer telescoping pole but it only fit on the pole in the kit. Not a big deal normally with Amazon but I went to return it and was told it was not eligible for returns...
customer_reviews.author: Skydive Snohomish - Primary

customer_reviews.title: The Mop You're Looking For!
customer_reviews.text: Best Mop Ever, highly recommend! This mop is easy to work with, easy to adjust and cleans great. I love the fact that it is chemical free mopping! This was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Great mop!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great dust mop and at a good price. It works well on my new hardwood floors. The company seems to really care about their customers and the environment. The greeting card that came with the mop was a great marketing idea!
customer_reviews.author: Adam Raynor

customer_reviews.title: Broke
customer_reviews.text: Broke the 1st time I used it and it’s not eligible for return.
customer_reviews.author: JKC

customer_reviews.title: So far the microfiber broom or duster is really good! Prob
customer_reviews.text: So far the microfiber broom or duster is really good! Prob. better than the Swiffer since I can wash it. It also seems to pick up little more. The mop part I haven't used yet but I will. That's the only reason why I gave it a four star. But looking at the mop part it looks like it has fringe at the end which is good. Makes it good to pick up anything from the edges. you can send me another survey about the mop part. And by then I will know if that part was good.
customer_reviews.author: Marcy

customer_reviews.title: An addition to my cleaning supplies
customer_reviews.text: A woman cleaning my house said I needed some better cleaning supplies. I added this for cleaning floors which have a variety of tile and laminated wood flooring.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Camfield

customer_reviews.title: Love my mop!
customer_reviews.text: The micro mop is so easy to use and clean. It covers a large area and able to get underneath places that were hard to reach. The long handle keeps me in good ergonomic form hence no back pain! Best mop/system around.
customer_reviews.author: MBS

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. Washable pads are easy to clean and pick up dirt well. I like that the handle is adjustable and it can fit into a small cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: jeanette smith

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this microfiber mop
customer_reviews.text: SO easy to use, buy multiple microfiber pads and be ready ALL the time to mop. LOVE the way it picks up everything, can be used as a dust mop OR wet mop. I think it's the best cleaning tool and I love it
customer_reviews.author: Richard Lehmberg

customer_reviews.title: What a well made product
customer_reviews.text: Just received early this morning only draw back is Can’t stand blister packs!! Other than that this a very very decent product and worth the money even though it’s a bit more than I wanted to spend
customer_reviews.author: Curious 1

customer_reviews.title: Great mop for dusting and washing floors!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my Norwex mop I had purchased three years ago. This is a great mop for 1/3 the price of a Norwex mop. Seems to be a lot studier than the Norwex mop.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Best mop ever for laminate floors
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for 8 years to find a mop for my shiny laminate mahogany flooring that doesn't leave streaks or residue. I finally fount it!!! This is the best system ever and I would recommend it highly!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cherchez French Femme

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Performed much better than expected and my bathroom floors look amazing. Sturdy construction and velcro pads stick securely. And so easy to throw into the laundry and clean. I don't like wasting paper products and I worry about how much trash we put out. This mop not only cleans better than any product I've tried but its helping save the environment.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen

customer_reviews.title: So easy and no mop bucket needed....
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this mop!! Just moved into a new home with new wide plank hardwoods; this mop is great for dog hair and keeping the floors looking brand new. I made a little spray bottle with water / murphy's oils soap for the wet brush....i worried that my floors wouldn't get clean (as we have no lawn yet and North Carolina red mud with two dogs - corgi - tons of hair shedding... and a boxer - big feet)....and the mop did the trick and no disgusting mop bucket!! I used the dry brush first (super easy and attracted all the hair); then onto the wet brush with my spray combo and done.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's amazing
customer_reviews.text: Omg!!! I have all wood and time floors and this has cut my cleaning time in half!!! It would literally take me all day to sweep/mop/ then back over with vacuum. And I just finished in the time it took my youngest to nap!! With 3 kids and 2 dogs I couldn't ask for a better product!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Not usable with my Bona pads.
customer_reviews.text: This is not what I needed or expected. I wanted a Bona for the disposable pads I use & love. Now I am not even allowed to return it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: DAS

customer_reviews.title: A good purchase, well designed and executed.
customer_reviews.text: The only improvement I could think to make to this is I wish the handle was a few inches longer (I'm 6' 4") and maybe a little stiffer. The pads, velcro, and other design elements are really nice. Overall, I'm pretty happy with the product!
customer_reviews.author: Jhowell275

customer_reviews.title: Broke after couple of uses
customer_reviews.text: well technically it didn't break the sticky tapes came off and now i am unable to use it
customer_reviews.author: Hurman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use...Good for the planet
customer_reviews.text: I like the way the pads are labeled as to use dry or wet. I love the way they grab and hold debris. I love that I can wash and reuse. I used to use the prewetted disposable type. I like this a lot better and it will be cheaper in the long run as well as better for our environment.
customer_reviews.author: Candia Lundry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with Dredge!. I have 2 dogs and this product picks up the hair like magic. Update on review: I had a problem with the looseness at the mop handle connection and Customer Service was excellent. Very fast to replace and was very fast on getting the replacement to me. I can't say enough about the excellence and responsiveness of Temples Pride Customer Service. I love this mop!
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and easy to maneuver
customer_reviews.text: I like that unlike a Swiffer, this product has a washable head to it and comes with 3 different styles. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Taterhawk

customer_reviews.title: Great mop, but it broke after my first time using it - no returns :(
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mop, however, when you are cleaning you bump into things. I bumped into a table leg or something one too may times and the handle broke right off the mop head. I don't know if this is a design flaw or not - it's just plastic. But it broke after I bumped into a few things.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Garant

customer_reviews.title: Broke super fast
customer_reviews.text: Of course 2 days after the return window closes on here the pole brakes off the head :( really irritated as I haven't even used it much at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Burns

customer_reviews.title: It’s junk
customer_reviews.text: When you try to mop the dang thing flips constantly. Soooo annoying.
customer_reviews.author: mandon

customer_reviews.title: It is Easy to Work & clean properly
customer_reviews.text: This Cleaner Is Very Easy To Work Even For Old People It is Very Light Easy To Pick up To up stir Or Down stir & Just One time Swap Would be Sufficient. I Highly Recommended , & The Price It Is Very cheap. thanks REZA
customer_reviews.author: reza faraji

customer_reviews.title: Decent but not great
customer_reviews.text: For the most part this is a great mop. The issues I have with it is the flat end will unscrew from the poll.
customer_reviews.author: KayDnaleri

customer_reviews.title: Best mop I have ever had!  Other mops, I have owned, don't even compare!
customer_reviews.text: There are so many qualities that I like about this product: the ease in applying the pad to the base, light weight in handling, the 360 degrees of rotation, effective for all types of floors, machine washable pads, adjustable handle, etc. I could continue on but will sum it up with "it is an extremely effective mop and so glad I own one. I will highly recommend to friends and family members. Thank you for an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Marian Herrin

customer_reviews.title: So far a good product
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used all of the items as of yet but I have dry mopped and the pad works well with the handle.
customer_reviews.author: bsboen

customer_reviews.title: I love this mop
customer_reviews.text: I have just purchased my 2nd one! I have no complaints. My first one lasted a year or so! I did use it all day every day, so I recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great on hardwood and tile
customer_reviews.text: I’m loving this mop. The dry dusting pad picks up hair really well. The two pads that you use to do wet mopping work great to scrub off spots and leave my floor streak free. It’s very convenient to store too!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Burningham

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend and buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this... it works great it’s easy to use you don’t have to buy more cleaning pads all the time and it’s very light weight, yet has the ability to be used for deep cleaning/hard scrubbing
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Karns

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!!
customer_reviews.text: The mop is lightweight and easy to use. The different mop pads are great and easy to clean. I had a problem with the handle, and the customer service was awesome. They sent me a new one in a matter of days and even checked back with me to make sure everything was ok! I highly recommend this product and this company!!
customer_reviews.author: Lori A Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for tile floors. I have dogs and it keeps the floor tidy between cleanings
customer_reviews.author: Brad Guidry

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to use and I really like that it has ...
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I needed to get under my bed that is only a few inches off of the floor. It is easy to use and I really like that it has extra pads so I can have a wet one and follow up immediately with a dry one.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: A perfect addition to your cleaning supplies
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, adjustable handle length, mop heads are washable. Absolutely LOVE this for my laminate floors!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Greenley

customer_reviews.title: Great mop
customer_reviews.text: I use this mop daily from dry cleaning dog/cat hair up, to wet mopping from the dogs tracking in dirt and mud. Very easy to use and washes out nicely
customer_reviews.author: pam zygmunt

customer_reviews.title: great at first but did not last long
customer_reviews.text: I liked the product for being light weight and easy to use to reach under couches and tables. However, this product was used daily for house cleaning and did not last me as long as my previous broom (from a different brand) that lasted me years. This one lasted about 5 months before the height adjustment on the pole stopped working properly, and now it can't screw together anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela H

customer_reviews.title: Mop Picks Up Pet Hair
customer_reviews.text: Love this mop, we have two hairy dogs and it picks up pet hair great. The mop handles mopping perfectly as well.
customer_reviews.author: KKR

customer_reviews.title: Telescoping Handle Driving Me NUTS
customer_reviews.text: Hopefully this is user error -- I love this mop, but the telescoping handles slide up and down while I am mopping and it's maddening. Otherwise it's perfect and really makes mopping easy, but the struggle to keep the handle height really interferes. I need to to play with it more and see if and how other people solved the issue.
customer_reviews.author: lipglossfreak

customer_reviews.title: Seems to push water/cleaner around the floor and not really do a great job of absorbing the liquid
customer_reviews.text: For a quick dust mop job this does the trick! However, I'm not a big fan of the wet mop option. Seems to push water/cleaner around the floor and not really do a great job of absorbing the liquid. I'd also like to see a bit of an abrasive strip for scrubbing.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn M.

customer_reviews.title: Used it 5 times before It broke on me.
customer_reviews.text: I loved it at first until plastic part that I guess it is supposed to keep it from flopping around while sweeping, malfunctioned. So of course now it is impossible to use because it flips on you.
customer_reviews.author: mambisa

customer_reviews.title: Simple to Use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. More economical and less waste than disposable pad wet/dry systems.
customer_reviews.author: Debi B

customer_reviews.title: Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product. Makes mopping convenient and quick. Well worth the money. I love mine. Lance @ dredge is fabulous . He went above and beyond to help me when I needed help.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer obrien

customer_reviews.title: Works great - until it doesn't
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for about 3 months of daily floor dusting and weekly mopping. Then the pole/handle broke. Would love to be able to buy just a new handle.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Olney

customer_reviews.title: High quality, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I love this mop! It cleans both tile and wood floor well without leaving streaks, super easy to rinse between rooms, and high quality velcro. I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: beth

customer_reviews.title: Useful for more then just floors
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I was able.to use it to dust the corners of my celieng as well. More then just a mop.
customer_reviews.author: kb53

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Had to get one after using them at work. Able to clean many areas. Love it! I bought extra pads
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: 360 isn't as good as it sounds.
customer_reviews.text: This mop does get the job done. However, while the 360 mobility sounds good when actually using it, I find times where the mop moves uncontrollably and I cannot keep it on the floor. I think it would be better if the mop had a stop moving to the front. So, just 3 sides would move.
customer_reviews.author: Denny

customer_reviews.title: Ease moving it around
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mop I ever used and I used plenty. It’s worth the extra money
customer_reviews.author: ROYCE JOLLEY

customer_reviews.title: I was hoping for a better product.
customer_reviews.text: The pole is nice but after a few washing the pad is not sticking to the Velcro on the back of the pad. I bought a rubber main paid and that seems to work well with the pole.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Real handy for hardwood, laminate or tile floors, ...
customer_reviews.text: Real handy for hardwood, laminate or tile floors, have not experienced any of the breaking problems others have mentioned, maybe just lucky? We have pets inside so it is used daily.
customer_reviews.author: Jski1

customer_reviews.title: Good for simple jobs.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my classroom. Works well for daily sweeping and small cleanups.
customer_reviews.author: Trista Sampson

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful, healthy way to clean. I have passed this information on to those who are going with chemical free cleaning. This company is the first company to ever personally email me and give me further instructions. They have checked back to make sure I am satisfied with the product or need any further assistance. Great marketing!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry L. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Love this light weight mop
customer_reviews.text: Love this light weight mop, it adjusts which is very nice. One of the mop heads is unraveling a little bit but seems to still work ok for now, probably won't hold up to washing. Will definitely be ordering replacements.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: But I am sure it would do a good job on wood or not course tile
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work on my floors cause the tile is very course. But I am sure it would do a good job on wood or not course tile.
customer_reviews.author: Guz393

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Easy to assemble and use. Durable. Great customer service and quick shipping. If you have pergo/laminate flooring, this is a must have!
customer_reviews.author: Donald M. Racine

customer_reviews.title: 4 Dogs, 2 people, so much dust, hair, & debris.
customer_reviews.text: So easy to set up, & the dry pads are good to go with shake out for a couple of times before washing. Very efficient for a medium size mop, gets into the corners great & under furniture with only an inch of space (where the dust bunnies multiply). When I go over an area I don't feel like I have to redo it.
customer_reviews.author: Christina B.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic mop, large size
customer_reviews.text: I use it for a beach condo with ceramic tile. I really like its large size and long adjustable handle for tall people. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Easy and does the job
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Light weight and efficient. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Good for commercial
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good quality for cleaning services. Nice and strong material.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Great product for easy cleaning!
customer_reviews.text: Love this mop! So easy to use and clean. And the swivel gets the corners, not your wrist😊. I would highly recommend Temples Pride and this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Floor cleaning system
customer_reviews.text: This is grate for all my hard floors easy to use and to clean
customer_reviews.author: Herbert Kneisley

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: First public review ever from me for a product. I consistently reach for this mop for dry and damp cleaning, I like the results that I get and it is built very well. More important to me has been the outstanding customer service and immediate response to any concern or question that I may have.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Ann Ruley

customer_reviews.title: Its alright
customer_reviews.text: This mop is pretty good. Only problem is that I use the mop a lot and the pole broke already. I could tell innitially it felt flimsier while mopping compared to other ones ive used. Its a good at home mop. Just not what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction. Item broke during second use.
customer_reviews.text: Only reason I gave a one star rating is product construction is very weak. The mop head is attached to the handle by a small round plastic pin. While using mop I bumped up against leg of bed and the pin broke. Also Amazon.com does not have a return section for this specific item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful mop. It keeps the floor looking shiny and clean. The dust mop is great for high shelves.
customer_reviews.author: MomlifeMBT

product_meta.title: Professional Microfiber mop for Hardwood Tile Laminate & Stone Floors Dredge Best All in 1 kit Dry & Wet Cleaning +3 Advanced Drag Resistant Pads|revolutionize Your Mopping Experience
product_meta.description:
Size:18 Inch-with pad on

Here is what to expect with your purchase today!

When your beautifully packaged floor mop with washable pads arrives, you are going to have to resist the urge to not want to rip it open so as not to spoil its wonder and beauty embraced upon it! It is very important you rip it open the first chance you get, remember, your floors are in great need of its advanced care! Take it out and admire its sleek durable and extremely solid ergonomic design, extend its unique patented 3 section telescopic aluminium handle while connecting the mop head then simply drop one of your super absorbent drag and friction resistant pads on the floor, conveniently place the frame on top and prepare to be amazed in half your usual mopping time as it effortlessly glides over your floor absorbing and removing dirt with water alone! Phew, that was a mouth full!

You will notice the vacuum coming out less and less since your pads are hair and fur magnets! As you use and experience your fantastic new washable microfiber mop for hardwood floors you will notice yourself glancing over to the ol shaggy mop and bucket system with a grin on your face as you realize you have not only eliminated IT but also diminished the use of the Hoover sitting next to it!

What you get in this incredible deal:

 * 1 Telescopic Handle
 * 1 Flat Mop Head with hook and loop bottom
 * 2 Premium drag and friction resistant heavy duty pads
 * 1 Superfine dry only electrostatic pad (ONLY FOR DRY WORK IE; THE STATIC HAIR/FUR MAGNETIZATION AS SPOKEN OF EARLIER OR FOR DUST MOPS FOR HARDWOOD FLOORS;)

And last but not least Our 100% Money back Guarantee with world-class customer care and support

Order your's now then get ready for clean and germ free floors like you've never seen before!.
feature_bullets: ♻️MAKES FOR A PERFECT HOUSEWARMING GIFT, SO MUCH BETTER THAN A DISPOSABLE MOP WIPE SYSTEM - This professional microfiber floor mop is much easier to use, it's also easy to manoeuvre, attach and change the pads, easier to wash and very easy to get under furniture. This is about as easy as mopping gets.

♻️THE MICRO FIBER PADS ARE EASY TO CLEAN AND DON’T SHRINK - Just throw them in the washer and you will soon discover that this is the best sustainable way to have a mop that cleans deep, is environmentally friendly and lasts a long time in your home.
♻️YOU DON’T HAVE TO BEND OVER - The sturdy and well constructed telescoping handle is easy to adjust and allows any height adjustment from 29 Inches all the way up to 62 Inches.

♻️COVERS A-LOT OF AREA IN ONE SWEEP - With it’s large, 18 Inch base, it devours floor space in no time. Even better for quick and easy cleanup’s, makes mopping the floor a breeze whether you use the duster pad or the wet mop cleaners. Suitable as a hardwood, laminate, Vinyl or tile floor mop.

💚SATISFACTION GUARANTEE - Our customers say our Dredge mop does a great job, it’s lightweight and easy to put together, easy to store and is a much easier way to clean your floor, it simply gets the job done, all in record time. If you find that your mop does not live up to these claims then simply let us know and we will give you your money back. Your mop is backed by a 2 Year Manufacturer Warranty. Replacement pads available, search 🛒 B01JA1A5Y0
